question: My husband has chronic back pain, can hear fluid running in his head, and has numbness in his hips and upper left leg.  He is 5'11'' and 355 lbs.  I have changed his diet plan and got him on a regular exercise plan to help with the weight problem.  The doctors have told him that he does not have high blood pressure, high cholesterol,  or diabetes. What could be causing this, and what could we do to relieve his pain?
title: Chronic Back Pain
